1.content: "Ugh...what happened last night?", Eve said as she was waking up. Eve quickly realized that she wasn't at her orphanage. "Hey...this isn't the orphanage!", she said, fear evident. Trying to find out where she was, she found a sign post leading in different directions. Eve quickly made up her mind as she headed for...
1.title: The Adventure Begins!

11.content:
"Demon's Way?", Eve quizzically asked herself. "It must be a typo." And with that, Eve traveled to Demon's Way, unaware of the dangers she would face.
After a while, Eve felt something odd. She looked around to see a girl that had raccoon ears, a tanuki tail, bat-wings on her back, a horn on the top of her head, brown shorts, and a green tank-top that cover her ample chest(D-Cups), faint near her. "Whoa! Are you alright?!", Eve asked the girl as soon as Eve got close to her. "...", the strange girl looked exhausted.(She was covered head to toe in dirt.) "Don't worry, kid! I'll-I'll stay with you!", Eve told the unconscious girl. She noticed that it was getting dark. "I'd better make a fire.", she told herself before she got to work.

Sometime later(Around 7:00P.M)...

Eve tried to catch her breath after building not only a fire but also a tent. "I've outdone myself!", Eve told herself She noticed that the girl was waking up. *Sigh*"What a good nap.", said the girl. "Hi!", Eve said to the girl, spooking her. *Screams until she sees Eve is not a threat*"What'cha trying to do, give me a heart attack!?", the girl yelled. "I'm sorry!", Eve apologized. "Well, thanks for helping me.", said the girl before she got up. Her stomach groaned. "Ugh. I haven't had a piece of food for two days!" "Would you like some of mine?", asked Eve. the girl replied....
11.title: Demon's Way(Disgaea1-4)

choices: In the middle of the night...
111.content:
"Sure.", the young woman told Eve before sitting down. Eve offered her some fish(Which she is chewing through like a hungry wolf) before asking, "Excuse me, miss?" The woman stopped devouring her food, turned towards Eve and said, "My apologies, madam. I haven't had any food for two days." Eve was surprised that this woman survived for that long with out food. "Uh, miss?", she asked her. "Yeah?" "What's your name?" After Eve said this, the woman scowled and looked at her with a menacing look. "Why do ya wanna know?", the woman asked her in a vicious tone. Eve cowered when she saw the look in her eyes, but had the guts to say, "Be-Bec-cc-cause yo-yo-you wou-would ask th-the same thi-thing?!?", before bawling her eyes out. The woman still had that look when she saw Eve cry. 'I guess humans never change, ever after a century. They always want to know who they're talking to, even when it's a little obvious!', the woman thought. Even after ten minutes, Eve wouldn't stop crying. The woman, annoyed at her thought, 'GODDAMN! She can REALLY hold a note!' before she noticed that Eve was losing color. This anger turned to panic. 'If she doesn't stop, she's going to die!', she thought. Eve then, lost consciousness. "Hey! Kid! Wake up!", said the woman as she held Eve bridal style trying to wake her up. After 30 minutes, Eve groaned before opening her eyes to see the woman. "Thank God! You alright, kid?", the woman asked her in a worried tone. Eve, confused about what she just asked said, "Yeah, I think so." the woman then picked herself up before offering her hand to Eve. "I'm Kabuki Buku. What's your name?", Kabuki asked Eve with a warm smile. "...Eve Willows.", she said to Kabuki after 2 minutes of thinking about if she can trust her. As she said this, Eve took her hand. "What are you anyway?", Eve said to Kabuki in a quizzical voice. Kabuki chuckled. "I'm not surprised that you don't know what I am.", she paused, then continued. "To answer your question, I am a tanuki.", Kabuki finished. Eve looked at her confused, then she kicked her nether regions. Kabuki, angry asked her, "Why'd you do that?!", to which Eve replied even more confused, "I thought tanuki had big balls between their legs to show off?" Kabuki gave her a glare before chuckling. She then, pointed at her chest. "What do you call this, then?", she told Eve in a amused tone. "Anyway, We should go to sleep.", Eve said before letting out a yawn. Kabuki nodded her head in agreement.
Soon after, the two of them were fast asleep in sleeping bags that Kabuki managed to make from leaves.


Fun Fact:(Buku is actually Bugaku, both words(Kabuki & Bugaku) are masks in mythology)
111.title: Sure(They introduce themselves)

choices: The route back to the last chapter of the story
14.content: The sun scorched the tree tops, and laughed at the pale face below. Then, as if a lightbulb broke, the sun turned into the moon. "Why did it turn dark all of a sudden?" Eve said out loud, before turning back to look at the previous signs. They were gone, and replaced with a fortress of bushes. Scrambling backwards, Eve noticed little, tiny spots of light shining from the moon filling in the open spaces in the trees. Left with no other option, she had to find....
14.title: In-side the night closet.

151.content: She started to walk towards Station Square. She marveled how it looked like where she lived before. She then looked down the street and saw in the mirror, her body changed to a Kitsume (half dragon and half Fox) Eve: Wow, this is new, then a boy named Hypon accidently bumped into her, wrecking her train of thought.
151.title: Station Square(Sega)

choices: Eve gets the Station Square tour.
1511.content: Eve yelps as she falls down on her butt. *Winces* As she gets back up, she sees a purple Hedgewolf walk up to her and asked, "Hey, are you alright?", with his gruff voice, as he lended his hand...er, paw. "Yeah, I think so.", Eve told him as she took his hand and got back up. "I'm Hypon." "Eve Willows."
1511.title: Continue

15111.content: Hypon's fur changes back to its orignal Black and Grey color. "I see your new around here, Eve, you really should walk with me, I know everything about this place." Hypon said in his modest way.
15111.title: Eve gets the Station Square tour.

151111.content: Eve said, She love too, Hypon was surprised to see Eve's new form, but He shrugged it off and whent to the center of Station Square.
151111.title: She accepts

1511111.content: Does anything happen during the tour?
1511111.title: Continue

15111111.content:
While Hypon and Eve were on there tour of Station Square, A Blue Cat was watching them from the rooftops.
???: Whoever that girl is, She will know not to take my man. Hypon will be my boyfriend, One way or another, I swear on my name, Aqua the Cat.
15111111.title: A Rival

15113.content: Hypon looked at Eve with much interst. Eve then spoke, I'm sorry, but what are you?" Hypon stop looking at her body and then to her eyes and answered, "I am a Night-Blood Hedgewolf." His fur whent back to Black and then he added, "What are you, and What is your name?
15113.title: Something else

152.content:
Eve eventually came to the small village. She knew that this was no ordinary place and she was not in the same place she lived. Eve strolled around and came across with the snack shop. With hunger pain, she put her hand in her pocket, and realized that she don't have any money.

"Aaagghh, I'm hungry, but I don't have the money." Eve said miserably.

She then sat on the side of the house, looking as the pedestrian were walking. There were men, women, even children who were chatting, laughing and some were doing there work. Eve were just sitting down with her belly rumbling.

"What should I do...I don't know where I am, and I'm hungry." Eve said.

Just then, as eve were looking down at the ground she noticed the shadow stopped in-front of her. She didn't know who this shadow belonged to as she looked up, it was...
152.title: new land to see

choices: Blond girl with blue/white dress and a doll
1522.content:
It was an blond girl with black/white cloth, witch's hat and had a broom strapped behind her. Eve didn't know who this girl were until she asked the simple question to you.

"Who are you? I haven't seen you around here." Girl said.

"Well...I don't know." Eve replied.

The girl then observed eve for little while, then realized one thing and smiled at her. Eve could tell that she's no evil or any bad person since she can tell who's bad or good during her street-smart wits.

"You..must be from the outside world." Girl said.

"Out..side world?" Eve said, worried little. "Where am I? and who are you?"

"This is the land of Gensokyo." The girl replied, "And my name is Marisa Kirisame, nice to meet ya!"

Eve then introduced herself to Marisa and thought for while. She heard of Gensokyo somewhere...she tries to remember until her stomach grumbled. Marisa heard the noise as eve blushed with embarrassment, she rose her hand to Eve.

"Say Eve, I just finished doing some business here so why don't you come with me." Marisa said. "I'll give you some food."

"Really?" Eve asked.

"Hey, I can tell your more about Gensokyo while you eat so its two birds in one stone right?" Marisa asked with smile.

Now that she thought about it, she could learn more about this Gensokyo place and she didn't know where to go so she smiled and took the offer. Both Eve and Marisa got out of the village and the yellow-haired girl then put the broom in between her legs and looked at Eve.

"C'mon eve, hop on!" Marisa said.

"What? why?" Eve asked.

"We'll fly, that's why." Marisa said.

Eve were amazed to hear that: this girl can fly! Even though she is little afraid of height, she mustered her courage and got behind her. Marisa lifted her broom, asking eve if she was ready and eve nodded. There were little whirlwind and within second, the two of them jumped high in the air! Marisa and eve were in the air, and she was very excited to see this! she could see many open field, forest and mountains! as Marisa started to move forward, she opened her mouth.

"So how's the view eve?" Marisa asked.

"It's amazing!" Eve replied.

"We will get to my house with in 10 minutes OK?" Marisa said.

"Ok." Eve replied.

As the two went, Marisa spotted someone blocking her way. She stopped as Eve looked to the side, she noticed someone as well.

Who was it?
1522.title: Meeting the ordinary witch

15221.content:
It was a blond girl with blue/white dress and a doll that were floating. Eve was astonished that were another girl that was flying. Marisa looked at her with a smile.

"Hey Alice, what's up?" Marisa said.

Eve asked Marisa who she was, and she told her that the girl is none other then alice margatroid, the witch who had ability to control the puppets. She was nicknamed 'seven colored puppeteer' since she controls the puppet perfectly like an rainbow. Eve looked at Alice and noticed that she was pouting.

"Marisa, who is that girl?" Alice asked.

"Oh her? her name is Eve, and she's from the outside world." Marisa answered her.

Eve said 'hi' to Alice and noticed she sighed she came to them and observed her. Eve looked at her blue eyes, and noticed she didn't have any threatening glare at her. Alice then turned her attention to Marisa.

"Don't tell me she's your new friend." Alice said.

Eve and Marisa were kinda confused by this and Marisa assured her that she was her acquaintance right now. Marisa suggested that she should be friendly with eve as well. Alice thought for while and agreed with Marisa, blushing. The three of them then moved forward to Marisa's house.
15221.title: doll judgement

choices: A blue-haired woman with a hat shaped like a....house?!
A white-haired girl with red overallls.
1523.title: other

153.content:
Eve quickly made up her mind as she headed for... New York? "What?..."

To say Eve was confused would have been a great understatement. When she saw the sign pointing to New York, she thought someone had carried her off in the night and dumped her at the outskirts of the city. Only, as she viewed the city skyline, she noticed something was not quite right. "The buildings... they're in a different order than I remember." she whispered, unnerved. "What's going on here!?"

For a moment, Eve considered the thought that she may be mistaken but she had a very good memory and the city she was looking at was not her New York. Panic began to set in. "Where am I?" she asked herself.

Seeing the sun staring to rise, Eve decided to walk into the city to find out. She had lived on the streets before, the same rules applied and she knew how to defend herself. Only, as she walked onto the streets, she found that all the street names were different as well. It was further proof that she was no longer in New York but it did not answer where she was. Eve looked about and saw a newspaper in the trash and picked it up to find it was the Daily Bugle. She had never heard of such a newspaper but she saw that the date was correct. The headline read: 'SpiderMan does it again!'

"SpiderMan?" asked Eve, confused. "Who in the world is that?"

Shrugging it off, Eve looked around and saw a police officer, sitting in his squad car. She gulped, not really wanting to deal with the police as she was once forced to steal to eat, she walked over to the car and politely cleared her throat. "Ex-Excuse me, officer." she said, timidly. "Could you tell me where I am?"

The police officer looked at Eve, concerned. "You are in New York City, miss." he replied. "Are you okay, did you hit your head somewhere?"

"This is New York!?" thought Eve, feeling her heart begin to race. "How can that be possible? This is not the city I remember!"

Eve took a step back from the squad car, her face turning pale. The police officer noticed this and slowly stepped out of the police cruiser. "Miss, I think you had better come with us." he said, gently. "You seem confused and you don't look so well to me either."

Eve trembled in fright, not knowing what to do. Only as the police officer reached out to take her hand, she...
153.title: New York(Marvel)

1531.content:
As the police officer came close, Eve began to panic. The man was fairly cute with black hair and brown eyes but he was twice her size and built like a rock. The man took a hold of her wrist, which was a mistake. Eve screamed at the top of her lungs and struggled to get herself free. The police officer meant no harm but Eve had no way of knowing that and she went into a frenzy when he grabbed her other wrist.

"Easy, miss!" said the officer, trying to take a hold of her other hand. he turned to the cruiser. "Carl! Give me a hand, the kid's gone nuts!"

"You're spooking her Paul!" scolded Carl, a slightly shorter man with brown hair and blue eyes. "Ease up a bit!"

Just then, Eve felt something shift within her as something move through her long red hair. She shivered, at the thought it was Paul running his hands through her locks but how could that be? He was holding both of her wrists. Paul gasped, looking at her and eased his grip as Eve eased her struggling. She was confused and startled by the new sensations she was feeling before she winced in pain. She both felt and heard something tear out from her skin and ripped through the back of her jeans. "What- What's happening to me!?" she whispered, looking up the the stunned police officers.

"I'm not sure, miss." replied Paul, slowly. "But I recommend you see a doctor."

That terrified Eve and she could only think of running away. "You're scaring me." she said, tears falling.

Just then, the lights of the cruiser went on as the siren blared, startling the three and Eve turned to see her reflection in the side window. Her eyes went wide, seeing that she now had yellow eyes, along with fox like ears with a fox like tail, but with spikes. She opened her mouth as if to scream but was startled again as all the cars around them started to honk their horns all at once. Paul released his grip on Eve, startled as well, and she took off running blindly down the sidewalk. "This is insane!" she screamed, crying. "Where am I!?!"

Unknown to her at the time, the lights were quickly changing to allow a path for her to run, quickly switching back to block any pursuit as the only thing on her mind at the time was to find a place to hide and think things through.

Later, as she stopped to rest, she looked up to find herself at the front gates of...
1531.title: screamed and struggled.

153131.content:
Reading the sign, Eve saw that she was in front of the Bellevue Hospital Center. "I can't be in New York." she whispered to herself, shaking. "This is an office building where I came from."

She began to breath heavily, terrified and confused as her tail twitched nervously, reacting to her emotions. She began to wonder is she should see a doctor when a deep voice reached her from behind. "Are you feeling alright, my dear?"

Eve spun around to find herself facing a man, or what resembled a man, wearing a long white lab coat. He was covered from head to toe in a blueish fur with pointed ears, sharp teeth, and large hands and feet. Eve's first thought was to scream but there was something calming about the 'man' that moved her not to. Perhaps it was his calm voice or his slow, polite movements. Either way, she just looked at him and began to sob.

"My whole world has changed!" she replied, crying. "I'm scared and confused!"

The man sighed and smiled at her. "You came to right place, child." he said. "I am Dr. Henry McCoy and here, we help many developing mutants find their place in this world."

"Mutants!?" thought Eve, shaking more. "I'm mutating!?"

Not able to take any more, Eve fainted into Dr. McCoy's powerful arms...
153131.title: A hospital

choices: She was in a hospital bed.
1531312.content:
*Groan*
Eve slowly opened her eyes to see a dark night with no stars above, and only the moon as a light in a otherwise thick fog. "Dr. McCoy?", she whispered, worried about the kind doctor. Eve sat up to see her surroundings, but could not find anything that stood out. (Well, besides the fog, anyway.) She then felt a presence behind her.

Quickly turning around, she saw a beast that easily towered over her, but due to both the fog and the beast's shadowy appearance, she could only make out a few things that stood out; The first one was obviously its size. The second one was the kitsune tail slowly wagging back and forth in a almost hypnotizing rhythmic fashion, but it also had.... 'Are those spikes on its tail?', Eve pondered as she realized that this was NOT an ordinary creature just on that one detail. Its yellow/amber eyes that shined through the thick fog like how a lighthouse aids ships and appearing to be staring into her very soul. Finally, It had shark like teeth which it showed off with a grin that would terrify even the most courageous of men. Eve, then finally noticed that it was slowly walking to her, almost feral-like by the way it was walking on all fours.

"Wh-What are you?", Eve asked the beast as it stood in front of her. It stopped in front of her, and whispered into her ear. "You."


Eve woke up with a start, before realizing that the monster was not here. "What the heck was that all about, anyway?", she asked herself. Looking at her surroundings and realized that....
1531312.title: A dream? More like a nightmare!

choices: Henry offers a place to stay.
15313121.content:
Eve found herself in a comfortable hospital bed with Dr McCoy looking over her. "You vitals spiked a few moments ago, they were off the charts." he explained, looking worried. "They seem to be going down now but I recommend you stay in the hospital for a few days for observation."

"Do you have any idea what caused my... change?" asked Eve, still rattled from her dream. "Am I... mutating?"

"Well, yes and no." replied Henry. "You see, we ran various tests on you while you were unconscious." he paused seeing Eve's panicked expression. "Nothing out of the ordinary, I promise."

Eve sighed. "What did you find?" she asked.

"We found you were right that this is not your New York." said Henry to Eve's shock. "We found traces of a very rare type of radiation that is only found when someone passes through a teleport portal. It seems one had opened below where you sleeping and you simply 'dropped in' on our world."

Eve gulped, trying to take it all in. "Well, that explains a lot." she said. "I'm glad I'm not going crazy." she the teared up, looking at Henry. "About my changes?"

"Your body is slowly adapting to this world." replied Henry with a sigh. "I'm sorry to say that this only happens when the portal that brought you here no longer exists."

"Are you telling me that I'm marooned here!?" asked Eve, trembling.

"I am truly sorry, Eve." said Henry. "Even if we could open a teleport portal, you may end up somewhere worse."

Eve buried her face into her hands, sobbing.
15313121.title: marooned.

153131212.content:
"You can't stay in the hospital for too much longer as you are physically healthy, despite your changes." said Henry. "However, I am not one to throw anyone on the street. I know of a place you can live and learn more about your new world and your... err... developing body."

"What kind of place is this?" still shaking, Eve asked.

"It's Xavier's school for the gifted." replied Henry, smiling. "I live there myself, as a teacher."

"I- I'll be okay." said Eve, uncertain. "I've lived on the streets before."

"You may find these streets less friendly than the ones you were used to." said Henry, calmly. "Please think about it."

With that, he left the room as Eve pondered over what to do...
153131212.title: Henry offers a place to stay.

choices: Eve gets pulled into an alley
1531312121.content:
A pregnant pause.

Eve glumly looked at the window. The setting sun over New York created the perfect backdrop. She turned her head back at Dr.McCoy and said "...I'll think about it." She paused, before continuing. "I mean yeah, living in a school sounds like the best thing ever. But the reason I need to think is because one thing."

"And what is that, if I may inquire?"

"When no one's looking at them, people can do some of the most evil things.", Eve muttered. She then tried to give a smile, but it was horribly forced. "Besides, it's not like the city's that dangerous, right?"

Eve could've sworn she heard laughing after that statement.


(A few hours later)

Eve slowly walked out of the hospital. She breathed in the chilly air and luckily was able to 'borrow' a beanie and coat from the hospital's lost and found.

As she walked, she was unaware of an pigeon wearing a camera with the letters DM, or of a hunched figure as a man looking at her with golden eyes.
1531312121.title: Eve leaves the hospital.

15313121212.content:
Eve had learned to be alert while living on the streets in her New York City. This city was no different; she jumped at the sight of a red beam hit a newspaper machine in front of her. She suspected it was a laser finder for a gun or rifle and frantically looked about for some cover. Only to her surprise, the newspaper machine began to move on its own! Every part of it moved with the sound of grinding gears as it took the shape of a small robot that stood in front of her.

"Extra! Extra! Read all about it!" The robot's voice was squeaky, like that of a small boy. "Girl falls in from another world! There goes the neighborhood!"

Eve shook her head, frightened and confused. she turned around and ran the other way only to see the red beam hit a soda machine that transformed in a similar manner. This robot knelled down, offering her one of its cans. "Herbal tea in a can." Its voice sounded like a young woman. "Nothing more relaxing for that crazy day in the city."

"Who are you?" Trembling, Eve asked.

"We are mechs." Simply, the robot replied. "I am Sodana. The young one behind you is Newsic."

"Here I though my New York was a weird place to live." Backing away, Eve muttered.

"Our master wishes to help you." Stepping closer, Newsic said. "We can take you to him or you can follow the signs."

"The signs?" Curious, Eve asked.

Sodana pointed down the street to a digital billboard. It was flashing, 'This way to meet me.'

What does Eve do?
15313121212.title: Machines that can talk... what!?

choices: Eve helps him get his head back on
153131212122.content:
Despite her better judgment, she followed the signs to Cliché Ville- I mean a old condemned house. Eve, despite every bone in her body saying "Get the fuck away from here!" walked inside. Instead of cobwebs and ghosts, however, she found life-size toy soldiers that suspiciously look like Korean Honor Guards(look them up) with clocks on their chests.

"M-m-mag-mag-nificent, aren't they-they?", said someone with a bit of a tinny twang.

Eve turned her head and her fox ears stood up as she saw a robot wearing a cape Perched atop his(Eve thought it was a guy) shoulder was a robo-parrot. "Re-beak!", said the bird.

The robot continued talking as he walked down the stairs. "You are-are probably wondering why-why I sum-summoned you here-re...." he paused. "You see-"

The robot tripped on his cape and was falling down the stairs where at the end his head came off and landed at Eve's feet. "I ne-need your help." he finished, feeling rather embarrassed about what just happened.




(Yes the birds name is Re-beak.) (http://www.blendswap.com/blends/view/698...)(What the robot looks like) (If you can't click on it, just copy the words and paste it in the URL)
153131212122.title: The Clockwrk King

1533.content: Wait a sec, are you sure that you want to choose this choice?
1533.title: fainted.

choices: Part 2(Read after Part 1 to know what whats going on.)
1551.content:
*Scene opens up with a view of New York in ruins and dead people laying about*
(SFX: BOOM!) *A giant Bio-mechanical beast is sent flying through several buildings due to a tank shell hitting it.*
*The creature stands about 140 ft tall, with a spiked tail club, two burnt off wings, spikes on its forearms and legs, with menacing Yellow eyes and is wearing a Ship-like armor that currently has a lot of holes that can be seen both behind and in front of it. It slowly got up, blood flowing from its mouth like a waterfall, with all sorts of error messages and system repair sirens going off in its body. After taking a few steps, It finally fell with a ground breaking slam.* "Sys-system Re-re-repair imminent. Hibernation mode....Activated............" *It said in a surprisingly very feminine voice before her eyes lost their color and she stopped moving whatsoever.*


Writing.com
Presents

A VGM765 Production

"Omoide ni a Kaiju yobikake Kaizo"("Memory of a Monster Called Kaizo")




(Okay, the beginning of this tale will different by many things. Here's what I changed:

The fact that Eve did not meet the crossroads and its different worlds.
Eve now lives under the ground. (Think of the underground villages from Gurren Lagann)
Eve has a family in this version.
(Note: If you want to add a character/chapter to this story, message me and tell me about your character's personality, what he/she looks like, likes, dislikes, Etc.)
Also, this story WILL borrow some things from other Super Robot shows.

Now, without any delay, here's the story:

In the year 2012, a race of monsters piloting giant robots that went by the name of Megid appeared from the very ground humanity walked on. They offered an ultimatum for the human race: Ether Mankind gives up their rights and become slaves for them, or that mankind will be destroyed. The UN responded that they wouldn't and on March 18(in what is now called "The Day of Unity"), they sent out two-million missiles in Megid encampments. Enraged, the Megid responded by sending out "Legion", an mechanical monster that destroyed most of the U.S.A, but was stopped and annihilated by the combined forces of the Japanese, Russian, and the remaining US military with a atomic bomb that exploded with the power that could destroy Fort Knox. Over 1,000,000,000 lives were lost, and in a desperate situation, the rest of humanity split into two sides: one that went underground to escape the Megid, and the other stayed to both accept being slaves to the monsters, and to give the first half a chance at escape(It succeeded)

481 years later...

Civilization now lives in two ways: one that lives underground and is ignorant of what's happened half a millennia ago. The other, is consistently reminded of this fact when this half split in two groups again: One half as slaves to Megid, the other hiding in the remains of buildings that are still standing.
Our hero, Eve is born on April 12, 2493. As we join her on her birthday before she has to work(She has to help make room by drilling and hacking holes on the walls to create room for more families.), she finds a small drill and a robot of sorts(A Cyber-Megid, if you will.) This tale begins with Eve about to activate her.
1551.title: A Tale of Past, Present, and the Future!

15511.content:
40 minutes earlier....

Eve was confused when she found a small device shaped like a drill. "How does something like this get down here, anyway?", she pondered. "This'll at least make for a good souvenir.", Eve said before putting it her pocket. "HEY EVE!", a energetic voice shouted. Startled, Eve gave out a spooked squeal before she turned to face her long-time friend Milly Erson.

A hard-headed, yellow-haired madwoman(due to her ideas), Milly stands a little shorter than Eve, has A-Cups, barely any curves, and is now wearing a grin that said 'I'M SO HAPPY!'. Due to the fact that Eve was used to Milly's personality(Though Eve gets spooked time and time again by the fact that Milly creeps up on her), she wasn't as angry as she was at first. "Christ, Milly!! What'cha trying to do, kill me!?" Milly's face changed from one of happiness to that of worry and regret. "Yeesh, Eve. I'm sorry for scaring you. Anyway, Happy Birthday!", Milly said before producing a gift for Eve. Eve looked at her, her surprised face slowly changing to that of kindness. "Thanks, Milly!", before ripping it open to reveal a necklace with a closed locket that was shaped like a heart. Eve opened the locket to see a picture of the two of them, and the two giving the peace sign. "If you ever are feeling lonely and I'm not there, just look in there.", Milly told her with a smile. Eve looked at her, awestruck at this gift before clutching it with a tear in her eye. *Sniff* "This is the best gift I've had in a while." Eve, then hugged Milly. Milly returned the favor before leaving to go back to work. But not before saying "See ya later, Eve!" Eve gave her a wave before returning to her work.

30 minutes earlier....

Eve continued working with her pickaxe and Eve guessed that she dug 15ft or more when she hits something metallic. "Huh?" Eve lifts up her pickaxe to see a patch of orange on metal. 'What the heck?! What is that?', Eve thought before determination filled her face. 'Only one way to find out!' And with that, Eve slowly but surely she chipped away more and more of the stone covering it.

7 minutes earlier...

Eve was both tired/exhausted from the work she had to do to uncover the machine and was again looking at the thing, awestruck.

The machine looked both mechanical and humanoid with its body structure. Its hands and toes had claws, while its shell made it look bizarre to look at. The chain-like tail that had a spiked ball at its tip behind it had a few smears of blood on it. Its face looked human-like except for the fangs jutting out slightly.
"Hi, Eve!", Milly said, spooking you again for the second time in a row. Turning to her, Eve yelled while grabbing Milly by her collar, "DO I HAVE TO PUT A BELL AROUND YOUR NECK!!!", Milly was clutching her ears and checking if she could hear still. "OW!! Hello to you, too! Anyway, what'cha find?" Eve answered to Milly, "I honestly don't know." Milly didn't hear cause she was climbing up to the cockpit of the thing. Startled, Eve quickly followed her and sat beside Milly in the cockpit, where Milly saw a hole that looked like a ignition slot. "Hey Eve! Come look at this!", said Milly. Eve looked at the slot and remembering the drill, put it there. It was a perfect fit. "Way to go, Eve!", Milly told her while giving her a slap on the back. Eve looked at her before turning the key(Drill).

Present Time
With a jolt of power the thing was slowly waking up. "Oh shit, Eve! Hide!", Milly told her as they got out of the thing and landed on the ground before hiding from the now awake monster. "...." The creature was silent as it looked around before noticing Eve & Milly.
15511.title: Episode 1: Reawaken! Mazin Kaizo!

155111.content:
The creature looked at the two of them with a vacant look. As it drew closer, Eve & Milly backed up until they had a wall behind them and the thing in front of them. "It's been nice knowing ya, Eve.", a scared Milly told her friend. Eve responded "Same here.", as they both waited for the thing to kill them.

They waited for 10 minutes for death to claim them. When they felt and heard nothing, a confused, yet scared Milly asked her friend with closed eyes "D-Di-Did it leave?" "I don't know. I'll check.", Eve told her friend. She squinted with one eye to see the thing right in her face. *SCREAM* Eve let out a terrified scream as she realized that it was still there. Milly gathered her courage and stood in front of Eve, her arms and legs spread out. "You'll have to get through me, you piece of old scrap!". Milly said the machine/monster, anger in her eyes. The creature looked at both of them, sadness in its eyes, before turning around, ran in said direction for about 30 feet, and let out a sniffle. Eve listened to it. It sounded both human and monstrous. Eve looked at Milly, with a look of regret, before saying to her "If something happens, run.", before she ran up to the creature and got in front of it. Milly looked at Eve was doing with a look that said 'Oh shit.', before yelling for Eve to come back.

Eve stood in front of the beast, who was on the verge of tears. Not knowing what to do, Eve decided to talk to it. "Hey, beast!" The thing looked at Eve, while still sniffling. Eve continued to talk. "I think we got off on the wrong foot. I'm Eve!", she said as she waited for its answer. "....Mazin Kaizo.", it finally said with a quite woman's voice. Eve was surprised to know that it was a girl, to say the least. "You're a woman!?", she exclaimed. Kaizo looked at Eve with a look that said 'Not a word about that.'

Eve decided to ask about her past. "How'd you get down here?" Kaizo looked upwards, as if trying to remember something, then looked at Eve with a frightened face. "I-I don't remember!", she told Eve before crying again. 'Amnesia?', Eve thought to herself. She decided to comfort her. "Hey. It's O.K.", Eve told Kaizo as she scratched behind her ears. Kaizo's tail was slowly wagging back and forth. "Thank you.", she told Eve before hugging her.

Kaizo then lifted Eve up. "HEY! What do you think you're doing!?", Eve yelled at her "Relax.", Kaizo responded as she put her up on the top of her head were the controls were. "What I remember is that the one who activates me is my leader. Also, I won't attack your friend that's yelling for you.", she explained. Eve finally heard Milly yelling her name. "Let's go, then!", as Kaizo ran in the direction she came from.

"EVE! GET BACK HERE, YOU IDIOT!!!!", Milly yelled. She was screaming Eve's name for 10 minutes straight before she heard thumping from something heavy. Before she realized it, Kaizo scooped her up and put her in the cockpit with Eve. "Who, where, how-!", a extremely confused Milly said as saw that she in the cockpit with Eve. "How'd you-?", Milly started to ask as Kaizo was running nearer and nearer to the village. "Apparently, I'm her pilot or something." Eve explained as Kaizo had 40 ft to go before she reached the village.
155111.title: Episode 2: What Do You Mean I'm A Pilot?!

1551111.content:
Somewhere in a unknown location....


"My Lord must know of this!", a person said as she discovered one old robot was located underground. Then, she ran to meet her master.

A hooded figure with shark-like teeth was running towards a pair of large doors. As he opened them, a lone figure stood there in a throne, an old man, his eyes closed. 'I'm probably gonna die for this.', the hooded figure said as she slowly shook her Lord awake. Suddenly, his hand shot out and grabbed the woman's throat. "What is it, Shiva?", the man said to the woman called Shiva with authority.

"Lord Dai, *Gack* there is *Wheeze* a robot *Cough* unaccounted for!" As soon as these words left her lips, Lord Dai dropped her like a sack of potatoes from shock. He then spoke to the woman softly. "Are you sure?" "Y-yes my Lord." The woman told him with fear in her voice. the man got up from his throne and walked about, thinking of what to do. He told the woman "Send one of the Megid to the location." "Yes, I'll do that once, your Majesty." the woman said before leaving in a hurry.

As soon as she left, the man looked out the window to think about the blip on the radar. "Could it be...Mazin Kaizo?" Lord Dai turned away from the window as he felt a presence. "I know you're there, Terrible Trio.", he calmly said. Three female figures appeared in front of him, almost as if out of thin-air, and knelled in his presence.

The smallest had black wings and a katana in its sheathe while wearing a traditional samurai armor and a mask to cover her face. The tallest was very slim and wore a green kimono that had a dragon pattern. Her amber eyes looked at her master in regret. The one in the middle had wings like the samurai, but were folded to not mask the other two. Her red eyes made it clear that she, along with the other two, were not normal in the slightest. "I apologize, my Lord.", said the one in the middle. "Rise.", he told them, which they quickly did. "State your request.", he asked, as they only bothered them when they need something. "If it not too much trouble, my Lord, May we join Lady Shiva on her reconnaissance?", asked the tall one curiously.

'If I send them, they will probably destroy whatever is causing the disturbance. However, if it is Mazin Kaizo...' Lord Dai thought before reaching a decision. "If the Megid that is being sent to the location is destroyed, I shall send the three of you to eliminate the target!"

"Thank you, my Lord.", spoke the shortest, before all three teleported away.

(Author's note: And thus, The story begins and our villains enter the picture! Shiva is the name from Hindu mythology, like how Asura is, so to reference Baron Ashura, I named one of the villains Shiva.)
1551111.title: Meanwhile...

15511111.content:
*sigh* "Barely anything happens in town, so why are we here?", a man by the name of Bobo Boss said as he was dozing off.

He was a portly man, with an ugly face. Okay, It would scare you the first time you saw him face to face, but underneath all that, he was a gentle giant that had enough strength for people to call him "Gigantor", whoever that was.

THUMP THUMP THUMP

"Huh? The heck's making that noise?", he turned towards the entrance, where the sound is coming from.

"GANGWAY!", Eve & Milly shouted as they were on a beast of sorts.

"Wah!" Bobo stepped back. The beast barely missed him by an inch. "The hell is that!?", he said the duo made the beast come to a halt. "The town's not gonna believe this.", he said as he ran towards the duo to see what just happened.

(A brief explanation later...)

"So, what saying is that this beast's name is Kaizo?", Bobo asked the two, who confirmed by nodding. "And that she doesn't remember much, but what she does remember is that Eve is her pilot?", Bobo finished. Kaizo nodded. "Yes." Bobo sighed a little before face-palming. "I may not be smart, but even I know that she's gonna have to go." "Aw c'mon, Bobo! She won't harm a thing, I assure you!" Eve begged. Bobo looked at Kaizo, who was.....doing something he didn't expect.

Kaizo's eyes grew big as they could get while also having a tear in one.

(Author's note: If you can't imagine this image, let me spell it out for you; she giving him the "Puppy eyes")

Bobo sighed again before saying "Fine. But she's YOUR problem, Eve. Got it?" "Right."

(Author's note: If you watched to old English dub of Mazinger Z, (The first dub, not the second attempt.) they changed a lot of the character's names (Example: Kouji became Tommy, Brocken became Decap, (I'm serious) etc. The name Bobo came from this hilariously bad dub. Also its kind of a Shout-out who they called Bobo. (Hint: Bobo's full name!)
15511111.title: Episode 3: Enter Bobo!

15521.content:
Okay, here's a few things I've changed just for this story;

Eve Willows is no longer an orphan, she does have a family in this continuity, along with a few friends and high school.

Her friend is Max Digh(17), a teen that lost a leg due to a car wreck, but has a prosthetic leg to cover this. He's very calm, but when he gets angry, he has enough strength to punch a hole through a brick wall. Barely taller than Eve.
15521.title: Intro

1553.content: What if she crossover into the famous world of Godzilla? And as a kaiju known as Evezilla?
1553.title: Tokyo (Godzilla)

info.brief_description: Eve, a once ordinary human, finds herself in a completely different world.
info.description:
Does anyone remember that old story I talked about in 'Inspirations, and other stuff?' Well this is the story I had talked about near the end.
WARNING: Many OC's will be in this story(Along with the heroes of a world(Nintendo, Sega, Etc.)

Now its time to meet the main character:

Name: Eve Willows
Age: 12
Gender: female(B20;W30;H19)
Bio: Abandoned at a orphanage in New York, Eve grew up fighting for her life. Her life was miserable. Until one day, Eve woke up and found herself in a new world(NeoKai). She will find new friends and foes in this world. Will she find a place where she belongs?

*NOTE*: She's NOT from our world(You read right). This WILL be a MASSIVE crossover, so if you got any ideas, I would gladly hear you out. However, if you write a Chapter(Or idea) that does not make any sense, they will be deleted. Also, Eve will have a costume change(think of Sora's changes in attire when he visits a different world in Kingdom Hearts.)

With that out of the way, Here we go!
